trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Aspen Hill
There were no other sightings in Aspen Hill on or around July 21st 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsCame out on my 2nd floor balcony with my Canon Powershot Camera and after a few seconds noted a bright white light in the sky moving from my left to my right. I thought it could be a plane. My balcony faces east. I started to film the light and it flashed and blinked on and off and moved erratically about the sky. Changing from smal blinking light, to big blinking light to a really big multicolored light and moving back and forth across the sky. I noticed after uploading the video that in the beginning up and to the right of the main object another dim flashing light zooms off screen. While observing the light I felt curious and determined to film it to see exactly what it was. I don't feel it was a plane at all.
Summary: On my 2nd floor balcony noticed light in eastern (I think) sky started filming
